name: NK S
text: I order from them often as I work nights in the area. I've only had a mistake on my order once and they immediately comped my meal. Not sure what all the bad reviews are for, they have always been a good Pizza Hut. Better than the one in Southfield.

name: Logarathinam RR
text: Very good location, but only pick-up or home delivery options are available, they don't have dine-in facility here. Clawson Pizza hut is the closest one from here.

name: PIzza Hut
text:
This Place is Great!! They're under NEW management with NEW hours and a very friendly staff.
NEW HOURS â€¦More

name: Sanil Juneja
text: The people were not even interested in taking orders or delivering the food. I could see my pizza ready for pickup but they wouldn't come to the counter to hand it to me for at least 10 minutes. Awful.

name: Ammar Abotouk
text: Good service, they don't cheap out on topping not cheese

name: S T Wood
text: Great stuff, friendly service. Delivery is prompt & courteous. A+

name: Meganathan Palanivelu
text: Good place for carry out order.

name: Jacob Overla
text: Doesn't deliver to my area, im 2.1 miles away. Kind of pointless to have delivery services that people can't use....

name: Lucas Dasilva
text: this place is 100% dope can't wait for it to open at 4:00 ayy lmao

name: Jessica Cordero
text: It was great he was so kind and helpful

name: Gregory Oden
text: Staff was friendly. This location doesn't include the lover's pizza in the any large pizza for 10.00. Pizza was very greasy and the Italian sausage had a funky taste to it, bacon was undone and had a bad after taste. This  location gets two thumbs down.

name: Sauce K
text: Place Doesn't Do Deliveries Until After 1pm

name: Mauds Way
text: They had to reset the computer every time someone paid with a credit card and stood there not knowing what to do!! I waited 30 minutes for my pickup order. smh.
